publicwhip.spmotion: * S3M-7335 Bruce Crawford on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Committee Membership—That the Parliament agrees that— Bill Kidd be appointed to replace Jamie Hepburn as a member of the European and External Relations Committee; Jamie Hepburn be appointed to replace Bill Kidd as a member of the Equal Opportunities Committee; Jamie Hepburn be appointed to replace Bill Kidd as a member of the Public Audit Committee.
